casebody.data:
Doe, on the Demise of Gallion, v. Griffin. J. Test, for the plaintiff. G. H. Dunn and A. Lane, for the defendant.

ERROR to the Decatur Circuit Court.

In ejectment, if the declaration be filed, notice given to the defendant, and a copy of the declaration served on him, ten days before the next term, the plaintiff must be ready at that term for trial, unless he can show a good cause of continuance.
